Estrid was awarded PhD from University of Melbourne in July 2020, where she also worked as a postdoctoral research fellow. Her research primarily focuses on natural language processing, with an emphasis on its applications to data mining and knowledge extraction. She is also passionate about techniques for enhancing the security, safety, and efficiency of existing deep learning models.
